name: Falling Blocks (itch) (Exenter)
description:
Goal

Get a big score by collecting the green glowing boxes. Control the blue sphere and try to survive as long as possible on the falling blocks.

 Blocks will fall when you touch them or an explosion hits them.

Enemies
  • Some quick little bumper cars that will try to push you off the map 🏎️
  • Some very slow tanks that will shoot at you with explosive missiles
  • Some big green guys that will create new blocks for you when they are far away, but be careful not getting to close to them 💣
Controls
  • WASD or arrow keys to move
  • Space to jump
